event.title: Clock
event.name: Cycles
event.description: The number of core clock cycles

event.title: Software
event.name: Increment
event.description: Incremented only on writes to the Software Increment Register

event.title: Cache
event.name: Instruction refill
event.description: Instruction fetch that causes a refill of at least the level of instruction or unified cache closest to the processor

event.title: Cache
event.name: Inst TLB refill
event.description: Instruction fetch that causes a TLB refill of at least the level of TLB closest to the processor

event.title: Cache
event.name: Data refill
event.description: Memory Read or Write operation that causes a refill of at least the level of data or unified cache closest to the processor

event.title: Cache
event.name: Data access
event.description: Memory Read or Write operation that causes a cache access to at least the level of data or unified cache closest to the processor

event.title: Cache
event.name: Data TLB refill
event.description: Memory Read or Write operation that causes a TLB refill of at least the level of TLB closest to the processor

event.title: Instruction
event.name: CONTEXTIDR
event.description: Instruction that writes to the CONTEXTIDR architecturally executed

event.title: Branch
event.name: Potential prediction
event.description: Branch or other change in program flow that could have been predicted by the branch prediction resources of the processor

event.title: Memory
event.name: Translation table
event.description: Instruction architecturally executed (condition check pass) - Write to translation table base

event.title: Cache
event.name: L1 data clean
event.description: Level 1 data cache Write-back - Cleaning and coherency

event.title: Cache
event.name: L2 data clean
event.description: Level 2 data cache Write-back - Cleaning and coherency

event.title: Intrinsic
event.name: STREX pass
event.description: Exclusive instruction speculatively executed - STREX pass

event.title: Intrinsic
event.name: STREX fail
event.description: Exclusive operation speculatively executed - STREX fail

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Load/Store
event.description: Operation speculatively executed - Load or store

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Integer
event.description: Operation speculatively executed - Integer data processing

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Software change
event.description: Operation speculatively executed - Software change of the PC

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Crypto
event.description: Operation speculatively executed, crypto data processing

event.title: Exception
event.name: Data abort
event.description: Exception taken, Data Abort or SError

event.title: Exception
event.name: Instruction abort non-local
event.description: Exception taken, Instruction Abort not taken locally

event.title: Exception
event.name: Data abort non-local
event.description: Exception taken, Data Abort or SError not taken locally

event.title: Exception
event.name: Other non-local
event.description: Exception taken - Other traps not taken locally

event.title: Exception
event.name: IRQ non-local
event.description: Exception taken, IRQ not taken locally

event.title: Exception
event.name: FIQ non-local
event.description: Exception taken, FIQ not taken locally

event.title: Release Consistency
event.name: Load
event.description: Release consistency instruction speculatively executed - Load Acquire

event.title: Release Consistency
event.name: Store
event.description: Release consistency instruction speculatively executed - Store Release
